newsitem.title: BELGIUM: EU monetary committee to meet on single currency.
newsitem.headline: EU monetary committee to meet on single currency.

text.p: The painstaking task of putting key decisions on European monetary union into legislative form will dominate the agenda of the EU's monetary committee on Tuesday.
Monetary sources said work on an agreed stability and growth pact and a new exchange rate mechanism will be among the issues the committee will discuss at its regularly scheduled gathering.
"Certain legislation is needed to put political agreements into force," said one EU source.
The group, comprised of national treasury and central bank officials, will receive an update from EU working groups on the state of legislative preparations.
They will also lay the groundwork for a meeting of EU finance ministers on February 17, which will include Belgium's economic convergence programme.
The committee will also consider recent economic developments within the EU, another item on next week's ministerial agenda, sources added.
